Formal Ladies Suits

A long Kurta or short Kurta in a solid colour, preferably in white or cream, with minimal embroidery or embellishments is a good option. Pair it with pants, palazzos, or a skirt in a matching colour for a coordinated look.

Semi-Formal Suit Design for Girls

A Wide Variety Of Fusion Wear For Women

Fusion wear for women is a perfect blend of traditional and contemporary fashion. It brings together the best of both worlds, combining elements from Indian ethnic wear and Western wear for women. This unique fashion trend has led to the emergence of a wide variety of indo-western fusion dresses and ethnic fusion wear styles, catering to diverse tastes and preferences.

Party Wear Sharara Suits & Modern Sleeves Design for Kurti

Indo-Western fusion dresses seamlessly merge traditional Indian silhouettes, patterns, and embellishments with modern cuts, fabrics, and designs. These dresses often feature a mix of Indian textiles like silk, brocade, or cotton blend fabrics with Western elements like A-line cuts, high-low hemlines, and designer necklines. Ethnic fusion wear styles encompass a broad spectrum of clothing options that incorporate traditional Indian elements into Western-style garments. This can include tunics with intricate Indian embroidery, dhoti pants paired with crop tops, or a saree-inspired plazo dress.

Fashion fusion has opened up endless possibilities for experimentation, allowing women to express their individuality and creativity through their clothing choices like paint suit designs.

Our Bestselling Suits and Kurta for Women:

White Kurti for Women

From plain white kurtis to designer white kurtis, our kurtis are made in premium quality fabrics. You can style these white kurtis for all types of events. A white kurti with embroidery will look stunning at wedding parties, while a white kurti with jeans can be worn for a casual outing.

Punjabi Kurta Pajama

In Punjab, many women wear salwar kameez daily. They usually wear Patiala Salwar Suits. Their suits are made from comfortable cotton and cotton blend fabric. They pair a phulkari dupatta with kurta and palazzo.

Chikan Kurti

A chikan kurti is the embodiment of traditional charm. Intricate chikankari details on a kurti can take your look from meh to magnificent. Jaipur Kurti offers a range of chikankari kurtis for women. You can wear these chikankari kurti with palazzos and sharara for a complete aesthetic look.

Cotton Jaipur Sharara Suit

Our cotton sharara suit sets are stylish, comfortable, and flattering. You can style our sharara suit cotton for the tropical climate of India as it is breathable and lightweight. Jaipur Kurti has a wide range of cotton sharara suit designs for women. A white sharara suit or a frock sharara suit is the ideal summer outfit. Every outfit is masterfully crafted with attention to detail and luxurious fabrics like Cotton Jaipur, Silk, Muslin, Velvet, Rayon, chanderi, and more. The signature cotton Jaipur Fabric used to design the cotton Jaipuri kurtis has a buttery soft feel and is favored by women across the country.

Palazzo Dress

Palazzo for Girls is a fashion statement. Our plazo for women comes in a plethora of sizes, designs, patterns and colors. Different types of palazzos are worn for different occasions. High-rise palazzos with button closures can be styled for formal occasions and palazzos with elasticated waistbands can be styled with kurtis and short kurtis.

Direction to find your right fit.
Take exact body measurements around fullest part of your bust and look for corresponding size in the size chart. For Example.
  • If your measurements around fullest part of bust is 33 inches then garment size will be size S.
  • If your measurements around fullest part of bust is 35 inches then garment size will be size M.
  • If your measurements around fullest part of bust is 32 inches, go for a size S if you prefer relaxed fit, else go for size XS.
